column2: To benefit the people and places where we operate we have set goals to replenish more water than we consume

column1: by 2030 and to support water security in communities where we operate. We are focused on three areas: enhancing
our stewardship of water resources across Google offices and data centers; replenishing our water use and improving
watershed health and ecosystems in water-stressed communities; and sharing technology and tools that help
everyone predict prevent and recover from water stress.
column4: we remain steadfast in our commitment to

column1: sustainability and we will continue to lead and encourage others to join us in improving the health of our planet. We
are proud of what we have achieved so far and we are energized to help move the world closer to a more sustainable
